Serum level glucose , insulin , C-peptide analyze biochemical autoanalyzer . The area curve ( AUC ) change blood glucose compute trapezoidal method . 2 . Glycemic index ( GI ) : area glucose response curve consumption test food divide area curve consumption control food contain amount carbohydrate calculate use 50 g glucose reference .
